content.description: ... Borja Andrés Marroquín, from bilbao and fan of Barça.
I studied Computer Engineering at ‘Universidad de Deusto’ (Bilbao) but before this, I have always had an interest in building my own web pages.
Once I finished my degree in 2008, I moved to Madrid for work and I have been here ever since.

My first job was working as a web developer in Virtual Software, developing various items in back-end, front-end, related with databases, analysis, ... a bit of everything really. Although primarily specializing in front.

In January 2013 I joined the team at Upplication, exclusively as a front-end developer , with the responsibility of choosing the architecture, frameworks, languages, etc to be used in this part but, when I can, I escape to the back-end or automation to play with nodejs or gruntjs
